aircraft.value: Thunderhawk X-12 - AC-8136-116 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Fire control computer error. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Weapon Release component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 14/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 17/01/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 15/01/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 18/01/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 22/01/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
